00006 // \file

00009 #include "vgui_multiply_4x4.h"
00010 
00011 void vgui_multiply_4x4(double const A[4][4], double const B[4][4], double M[4][4])
00012 {
00013   for (unsigned i=0; i<4; ++i) {
00014     for (unsigned k=0; k<4; ++k) {
00015       M[i][k] = 0;
00016       for (unsigned j=0; j<4; ++j)
00017         M[i][k] += A[i][j] * B[j][k];
00018     }
00019   }
00020 }
